title: 414. Will Covid-19 Spark a Cold War (or Worse) With China?
description: The U.S. spent the past few decades waiting for China to act like the global citizen it said it wanted to be. The waiting may be over.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
